00063 typedef struct PaintStroke {
00064     void *mode_data;
00065     void *smooth_stroke_cursor;
00066     wmTimer *timer;
00067 
00068     /* Cached values */
00069     ViewContext vc;
00070     bglMats mats;
00071     Brush *brush;
00072 
00073     float last_mouse_position[2];
00074 
00075     /* Set whether any stroke step has yet occurred
00076      * e.g. in sculpt mode, stroke doesn't start until cursor
00077      * passes over the mesh */
00078     int stroke_started;
00079     /* event that started stroke, for modal() return */
00080     int event_type;
00081     
00082     StrokeGetLocation get_location;
00083     StrokeTestStart test_start;
00084     StrokeUpdateStep update_step;
00085     StrokeDone done;
00086 } PaintStroke;

00088 /*** Cursor ***/
00089 static void paint_draw_smooth_stroke(bContext *C, int x, int y, void *customdata) 
00090 {
00091     Brush *brush = paint_brush(paint_get_active(CTX_data_scene(C)));
00092     PaintStroke *stroke = customdata;
00093 
00094     glColor4ubv(paint_get_active(CTX_data_scene(C))->paint_cursor_col);
00095     glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00096     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00097 
00098     if (stroke && brush && (brush->flag & BRUSH_SMOOTH_STROKE)) {
00099         ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00100         sdrawline(x, y, (int)stroke->last_mouse_position[0] - ar->winrct.xmin,
00101                   (int)stroke->last_mouse_position[1] - ar->winrct.ymin);
00102     }
00103 
00104     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00105     glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00106 }
00107 
00108 /* if this is a tablet event, return tablet pressure and set *pen_flip
00109  * to 1 if the eraser tool is being used, 0 otherwise */
00110 static float event_tablet_data(wmEvent *event, int *pen_flip)
00111 {
00112     int erasor = 0;
00113     float pressure = 1;
00114 
00115     if (event->custom == EVT_DATA_TABLET) {
00116         wmTabletData *wmtab = event->customdata;
00117 
00118         erasor = (wmtab->Active == EVT_TABLET_ERASER);
00119         pressure = (wmtab->Active != EVT_TABLET_NONE) ? wmtab->Pressure : 1;
00120     }
00121 
00122     if (pen_flip)
00123         (*pen_flip) = erasor;
00124 
00125     return pressure;
00126 }
00127 
00128 /* Put the location of the next stroke dot into the stroke RNA and apply it to the mesh */
00129 static void paint_brush_stroke_add_step(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event, float mouse_in[2])
00130 {
00131     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00132     Paint *paint = paint_get_active(scene);
00133     Brush *brush = paint_brush(paint);
00134     PaintStroke *stroke = op->customdata;
00135     float mouse[3];
00136     PointerRNA itemptr;
00137     float location[3];
00138     float pressure;
00139     int pen_flip;
00140 
00141     /* see if tablet affects event */
00142     pressure = event_tablet_data(event, &pen_flip);
00143 
00144     /* TODO: as sculpt and other paint modes are unified, this
00145      * separation will go away */
00146     if (stroke->vc.obact->sculpt) {
00147         float delta[2];
00148 
00149         brush_jitter_pos(scene, brush, mouse_in, mouse);
00150 
00151         /* XXX: meh, this is round about because
00152          * brush_jitter_pos isn't written in the best way to
00153          * be reused here */
00154         if (brush->flag & BRUSH_JITTER_PRESSURE) {
00155             sub_v2_v2v2(delta, mouse, mouse_in);
00156             mul_v2_fl(delta, pressure);
00157             add_v2_v2v2(mouse, mouse_in, delta);
00158         }
00159     }
00160     else {
00161         copy_v2_v2(mouse, mouse_in);
00162     }
00163 
00164     /* TODO: can remove the if statement once all modes have this */
00165     if (stroke->get_location)
00166         stroke->get_location(C, location, mouse);
00167     else
00168         zero_v3(location);
00169 
00170     /* Add to stroke */
00171     RNA_collection_add(op->ptr, "stroke", &itemptr);
00172 
00173     RNA_float_set_array(&itemptr, "location", location);
00174     RNA_float_set_array(&itemptr, "mouse", mouse);
00175     RNA_boolean_set(&itemptr, "pen_flip", pen_flip);
00176     RNA_float_set(&itemptr, "pressure", pressure);
00177 
00178     stroke->last_mouse_position[0] = mouse[0];
00179     stroke->last_mouse_position[1] = mouse[1];
00180 
00181     stroke->update_step(C, stroke, &itemptr);
00182 }
00183 
00184 /* Returns zero if no sculpt changes should be made, non-zero otherwise */
00185 static int paint_smooth_stroke(PaintStroke *stroke, float output[2], wmEvent *event)
00186 {
00187     output[0] = event->x; 
00188     output[1] = event->y;
00189 
00190     if ((stroke->brush->flag & BRUSH_SMOOTH_STROKE) &&  
00191         !ELEM4(stroke->brush->sculpt_tool, SCULPT_TOOL_GRAB, SCULPT_TOOL_THUMB, SCULPT_TOOL_ROTATE, SCULPT_TOOL_SNAKE_HOOK) &&
00192         !(stroke->brush->flag & BRUSH_ANCHORED) &&
00193         !(stroke->brush->flag & BRUSH_RESTORE_MESH))
00194     {
00195         float u = stroke->brush->smooth_stroke_factor, v = 1.0f - u;
00196         float dx = stroke->last_mouse_position[0] - event->x, dy = stroke->last_mouse_position[1] - event->y;
00197 
00198         /* If the mouse is moving within the radius of the last move,
00199          * don't update the mouse position. This allows sharp turns. */
00200         if (dx * dx + dy * dy < stroke->brush->smooth_stroke_radius * stroke->brush->smooth_stroke_radius)
00201             return 0;
00202 
00203         output[0] = event->x * v + stroke->last_mouse_position[0] * u;
00204         output[1] = event->y * v + stroke->last_mouse_position[1] * u;
00205     }
00206 
00207     return 1;
00208 }
00209 
00210 /* For brushes with stroke spacing enabled, moves mouse in steps
00211  * towards the final mouse location. */
00212 static int paint_space_stroke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event, const float final_mouse[2])
00213 {
00214     PaintStroke *stroke = op->customdata;
00215     int cnt = 0;
00216 
00217     if (paint_space_stroke_enabled(stroke->brush)) {
00218         float mouse[2];
00219         float vec[2];
00220         float length, scale;
00221 
00222         copy_v2_v2(mouse, stroke->last_mouse_position);
00223         sub_v2_v2v2(vec, final_mouse, mouse);
00224 
00225         length = len_v2(vec);
00226 
00227         if (length > FLT_EPSILON) {
00228             const Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00229             int steps;
00230             int i;
00231             float pressure = 1.0f;
00232 
00233             /* XXX mysterious :) what has 'use size' do with this here... if you don't check for it, pressure fails */
00234             if (brush_use_size_pressure(scene, stroke->brush))
00235                 pressure = event_tablet_data(event, NULL);
00236             
00237             if (pressure > FLT_EPSILON) {
00238                 scale = (brush_size(scene, stroke->brush) * pressure * stroke->brush->spacing / 50.0f) / length;
00239                 if (scale > FLT_EPSILON) {
00240                     mul_v2_fl(vec, scale);
00241 
00242                     steps = (int)(1.0f / scale);
00243 
00244                     for (i = 0; i < steps; ++i, ++cnt) {
00245                         add_v2_v2(mouse, vec);
00246                         paint_brush_stroke_add_step(C, op, event, mouse);
00247                     }
00248                 }
00249             }
00250         }
00251     }
00252 
00253     return cnt;
00254 }

00256 /**** Public API ****/
00257 
00258 PaintStroke *paint_stroke_new(bContext *C,
00259                               StrokeGetLocation get_location,
00260                               StrokeTestStart test_start,
00261                               StrokeUpdateStep update_step,
00262                               StrokeDone done, int event_type)
00263 {
00264     PaintStroke *stroke = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PaintStroke), "PaintStroke");
00265 
00266     stroke->brush = paint_brush(paint_get_active(CTX_data_scene(C)));
00267     view3d_set_viewcontext(C, &stroke->vc);
00268     view3d_get_transformation(stroke->vc.ar, stroke->vc.rv3d, stroke->vc.obact, &stroke->mats);
00269 
00270     stroke->get_location = get_location;
00271     stroke->test_start = test_start;
00272     stroke->update_step = update_step;
00273     stroke->done = done;
00274     stroke->event_type = event_type; /* for modal, return event */
00275     
00276     return stroke;
00277 }
00278 
00279 void paint_stroke_free(PaintStroke *stroke)
00280 {
00281     MEM_freeN(stroke);
00282 }
00283 
00284 /* Returns zero if the stroke dots should not be spaced, non-zero otherwise */
00285 int paint_space_stroke_enabled(Brush *br)
00286 {
00287     return (br->flag & BRUSH_SPACE) &&
00288            !(br->flag & BRUSH_ANCHORED) &&
00289            !ELEM4(br->sculpt_tool, SCULPT_TOOL_GRAB, SCULPT_TOOL_THUMB, SCULPT_TOOL_ROTATE, SCULPT_TOOL_SNAKE_HOOK);
00290 }
00291 
00292 int paint_stroke_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00293 {
00294     PaintStroke *stroke = op->customdata;
00295     float mouse[2];
00296     int first = 0;
00297 
00298     // let NDOF motion pass through to the 3D view so we can paint and rotate simultaneously!
00299     // this isn't perfect... even when an extra MOUSEMOVE is spoofed, the stroke discards it
00300     // since the 2D deltas are zero -- code in this file needs to be updated to use the
00301     // post-NDOF_MOTION MOUSEMOVE
00302     if (event->type == NDOF_MOTION)
00303         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00304 
00305     if (!stroke->stroke_started) {
00306         stroke->last_mouse_position[0] = event->x;
00307         stroke->last_mouse_position[1] = event->y;
00308         stroke->stroke_started = stroke->test_start(C, op, event);
00309 
00310         if (stroke->stroke_started) {
00311             stroke->smooth_stroke_cursor =
00312                 WM_paint_cursor_activate(CTX_wm_manager(C), paint_poll, paint_draw_smooth_stroke, stroke);
00313 
00314             if (stroke->brush->flag & BRUSH_AIRBRUSH)
00315                 stroke->timer = WM_event_add_timer(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), TIMER, stroke->brush->rate);
00316         }
00317 
00318         first = 1;
00319         //ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00320     }
00321 
00322     if (event->type == stroke->event_type && event->val == KM_RELEASE) {
00323         /* exit stroke, free data */
00324         if (stroke->smooth_stroke_cursor)
00325             WM_paint_cursor_end(CTX_wm_manager(C), stroke->smooth_stroke_cursor);
00326 
00327         if (stroke->timer)
00328             WM_event_remove_timer(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), stroke->timer);
00329 
00330         stroke->done(C, stroke);
00331         MEM_freeN(stroke);
00332         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00333     }
00334     else if ((first) ||
00335              (ELEM(event->type, MOUSEMOVE, INBETWEEN_MOUSEMOVE)) ||
00336              (event->type == TIMER && (event->customdata == stroke->timer)) )
00337     {
00338         if (stroke->stroke_started) {
00339             if (paint_smooth_stroke(stroke, mouse, event)) {
00340                 if (paint_space_stroke_enabled(stroke->brush)) {
00341                     if (!paint_space_stroke(C, op, event, mouse)) {
00342                         //ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00343                     }
00344                 }
00345                 else {
00346                     paint_brush_stroke_add_step(C, op, event, mouse);
00347                 }
00348             }
00349             else {
00350                 ; //ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00351             }
00352         }
00353     }
00354 
00355     /* we want the stroke to have the first daub at the start location
00356      * instead of waiting till we have moved the space distance */
00357     if (first &&
00358         stroke->stroke_started &&
00359         paint_space_stroke_enabled(stroke->brush) &&
00360         !(stroke->brush->flag & BRUSH_ANCHORED) &&
00361         !(stroke->brush->flag & BRUSH_SMOOTH_STROKE))
00362     {
00363         paint_brush_stroke_add_step(C, op, event, mouse);
00364     }
00365     
00366     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00367 }
00368 
00369 int paint_stroke_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00370 {
00371     PaintStroke *stroke = op->customdata;
00372 
00373     /* only when executed for the first time */
00374     if (stroke->stroke_started == 0) {
00375         /* XXX stroke->last_mouse_position is unset, this may cause problems */
00376         stroke->test_start(C, op, NULL);
00377         stroke->stroke_started = 1;
00378     }
00379 
00380     RNA_BEGIN(op->ptr, itemptr, "stroke") {
00381         stroke->update_step(C, stroke, &itemptr);
00382     }
00383     RNA_END;
00384 
00385     stroke->done(C, stroke);
00386 
00387     MEM_freeN(stroke);
00388     op->customdata = NULL;
00389 
00390     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00391 }
00392 
00393 int paint_stroke_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00394 {
00395     PaintStroke *stroke = op->customdata;
00396 
00397     if (stroke->done)
00398         stroke->done(C, stroke);
00399 
00400     MEM_freeN(stroke);
00401     op->customdata = NULL;
00402 
00403     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00404 }

00406 ViewContext *paint_stroke_view_context(PaintStroke *stroke)
00407 {
00408     return &stroke->vc;
00409 }

00412 {
00413     return stroke->mode_data;

00416 void paint_stroke_set_mode_data(PaintStroke *stroke, void *mode_data)
00417 {
00418     stroke->mode_data = mode_data;

00420 
00421 int paint_poll(bContext *C)
00422 {
00423     Paint *p = paint_get_active(CTX_data_scene(C));
00424     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00425 
00426     return p && ob && paint_brush(p) &&
00427            CTX_wm_area(C)->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D &&
00428            CTX_wm_region(C)->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW;
00429 }
